__TOC__


<<BR>>
We'll be hosting the first ever Testing in Ubuntu Birds of a Feather session at UDS-P.  This event is heavily inspired by the <nowiki>[[http://us.pycon.org/2011/openspaces/TestingBOF/|Pycon TiP BoF]]</nowiki>, and it will follow much the same format of opening remarks, followed by lightning round talks.

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| When:
| '''Wednesday, November 2nd at 7:00pm'''
|-
| Where:
| Plenary Room
|-
| I'm hungry:
| Pizza and beer will be provided
|}

<<BR>>
If you are going to be at UDS, and want to give a quick, 5 minute talk on something cool you've learned about or developed for '''automated''' testing, do sign up below.  You do not have to give a talk in order to attend.  The talks do not have to be about Ubuntu specifically, but should be useful to those developing Ubuntu infrastructure.

==== Summary of Testing/QA related Blueprints ====
'''QA Team'''
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/other-p-qa-metrics|Quality Metrics]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/other-p-builds-smoke-testing|Identifying build breaks on daily ISOs and reporting unit testing results]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/other-p-qa-test-case-management-tool|Piloting a new test case management tool for Ubuntu]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/other-p-qa-standard-sru-testing|Standard SRU Testing]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/other-p-qa-kernel-sru|Kernel SRU Testing]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/other-p-qa-test-case-definition|What is a test case?]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/other-p-qa-automated-test-submissions|QA Requirements for accepting unit tests]]</nowiki>

'''Certification Team'''
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/certify-planning/+spec/hardware-p-cert-sru-coverage|Improving automated certification testing of Kernel SRUs]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/certify-planning/+spec/hardware-p-cert-12-04testing|12.04 LTS certification testing]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/certify-planning/+spec/hardware-p-cert-selftest|Improve certification testsuite and processes for self-testing]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/certify-planning/+spec/hardware-p-cert-sru-community|Improve community kernel SRU testing]]</nowiki>
